data.title: How to Come Alive With Norman Mailer
data.meta_description: Norman Mailer, a towering figure in American literature, had a life that was certainly stranger than fiction. From his formative years in Brooklyn, through his career as a preeminent cultural voice, we follow Mailer's life through 6 marriages, 9 children, 11 bestselling books and 2 Pulitzer Prizes as he solidifies his place in the literary pantheon. With access to Mailer's family and never before seen footage, this biography details the life and times of an American icon.
data.text: Summary Norman Mailer, a towering figure in American literature, had a life that was certainly stranger than fiction.
